text:
Any GatsbyJS users in here? :eyes: 
If anyone’s interested I’ve created a Gatsby source plugin to make HubSpot blog posts available in your GraphQL queries <https://github.com/lewisvrobinson/gatsby-source-HubSpot>
Holy crap! yeah, I love Gatsby, mostly for personal projects, but now..... this makes me tempted to use it on client sites as well...
Great job Lewis, I'm really looking forward to trying this out!

Does anyone know how to use an anchor tag to link to a specific tab in tabbed content? I can't seem to get any of it to work. I've tried the suggestions above but nothing seems to work. Any thoughts are appreciated.
So how would that work on page load?
I trying to create a link like: <https://www.benefitexpress.info/hr-administration-webinars#tab-2>
Hi this will help you get resolved <https://forum.jquery.com/topic/open-specific-tab-when-page-is-load>
